definitions.explanation_en: A feminine given name of English origin, derived from the name Jane, which itself comes from the Hebrew name Yochanan, meaning 'God is gracious'. It is commonly used in Western countries and carries a gentle, traditional connotation.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英语的女性名字，由 Jane 演变而来，而 Jane 又源自希伯来语名字 Yochanan，意为‘上帝是仁慈的’。该名字在西方国家广泛使用，带有温柔、传统的印象。
definitions.example_en: Janice volunteered to organize the charity event last weekend.
definitions.example_cn: 珍妮斯上周末自愿组织了慈善活动。
